data.name: VacationAlertTaskSubject
data.value: Confirm scheduled vacation {0} from {1} to {2}

data.name: VacationApprovalAssignmentSubject
data.value: Confirm vacation dates from {0} to {1}

data.name: VacationApprovalAssignmentInstruction
data.value: Review the notice: 1. Make sure that the specified dates are correct. 2. Check the substitute specified in the "Substitute" field and change it if necessary. 3. Complete the assignment with the "Confirm" result. The notice will be signed automatically. 4. If you need to change the dates of the vacation, complete the assignment with the "Change Vacation Dates" result.

data.name: AccounterAssignmentInstruction
data.value: Do the necessary financial operations related to the vacation of the employee and complete the assignment.

data.name: AccounterAssignmentSubject
data.value: Take necessary actions on vacation: {0}

data.name: ShiftTaskAbortingReasons
data.value: The task to change vacation dates was aborted automatically as the change was not approved in due time.

data.name: AccounterAssignmentAbortingInstruction
data.value: The change of vacation dates was canceled. The scheduled vacation dates were not changed.

data.name: AccounterAssignmentShiftExpiredInstruction
data.value: The change of vacation dates was not approved in due time. The scheduled vacation dates were not changed.

data.name: ManagerNoticeSubject
data.value: Confirm scheduled vacation {0} from {1} to {2}

data.name: SubstitutionChangeSubject
data.value: Specify substitute

data.name: EmployeeFieldName
data.value: Employee

data.name: SubstitutionWillBeChanged
data.value: The substitution will be corrected.

data.name: VacationApprovedSubject
data.value: Vacation of {0} from {1} to {2} confirmed

data.name: Vacation
data.value: Vacation

data.name: VacationApprovedInstruction
data.value: The substitute for the vacation period is {0}. If necessary, change the substitution by clicking "Change Substitution".

data.name: SubstitutionWillBeCreated
data.value: The substitution will be created.

data.name: SubstitutionWillBeDeleted
data.value: The substitution will be deleted.

data.name: SignPaperDocAssignmentSubject
data.value: Make sure {0} prints and signs notice on vacation beginning

data.name: SignPaperDocAssignmentInstruction
data.value: 1. Review and confirm the notice on vacation beginning. 2. Complete the assignment.

data.name: VacationApprovalAssignmentAllPaperInstruction
data.value: Review the notice: 1. Make sure that the specified dates are correct. 2. Check the substitute specified in the "Substitute" field and change it if necessary. 3. Print out and sign the notice. Submit the signed notice to the responsible employee. 4. Complete the assignment with the "Confirm" result. 5. If you need to change the dates of the vacation, complete the assignment with the "Change Vacation Dates" result.

data.name: PrintAndSingPaperVacationAlertSubject
data.value: Print out notice on vacation beginning and submit it to responsible employee

data.name: SignVacationAlertShiftDeadlineDocInstruction
data.value: The change of vacation dates was not approved in due time. The scheduled vacation dates were not changed. 1. Print out and sign the notice. Submit the signed notice to the responsible employee. 2. Complete the assignment.

data.name: SignVacationAlertShiftCanceledDocInstruction
data.value: The change of vacation dates was canceled. The scheduled vacation dates were not changed. Print out and sign the notice and submit it to the employee responsible for vacations. Complete the assignment.

data.name: VacationApprovedWithoutSubstitutionInstruction
data.value: A substitute for the vacation period is not specified. If necessary, specify the substitute by clicking "Change Substitution".
